titles.title: A resolution designating July 15, 2023, as "National Leiomyosarcoma Awareness Day".
A resolution designating July 15, 2023, as "National Leiomyosarcoma Awareness Day".

action.text: Referred to the Committee on the Judiciary.

bill.summary: This resolution designates July 15, 2023, as National Leiomyosarcoma Awareness Day. Leiomyosarcoma is a rare cancer that grows in the smooth muscles of the hollow organs (e.g., intestines, stomach, and bladder) of the body.
